name: Sudoku Uno
summary:
Sudoku UNO is a brand-new puzzle game that feels familiar, but is all new! It uses rules you know from both UNO and sudoku to create unique puzzles. It takes 5 minutes to learn the rules. You will be a sudoku expert faster than you can shout UNO!
The rules are simple:
• Play UNO cards into spaces on a unique sudoku board
• Each card must match the number or the color of each card next to it
• All the cards in a row or column must add up to a target number
• You WIN when you play all your cards.
Hit PLAY NOW and Sudoku UNO will create a new puzzle with your chosen difficulty.
Play increasingly difficult levels and become a Sudoku UNO master. You won’t even notice yourself getting smarter every day!
Prove your skills with the Daily Puzzle. Every player in the world has the same Daily Puzzle. Finish it in record time!
